annotations: CCUURRRRIICCUULLUUMM VVIITTAAEE PERSONAL INFORMATION Full Name: Tran Huu Tam Date of Birth: Jan 26th 1983 Gender: Male Marital Status: Married Address: 19/69/15 Tran Binh Trong Street, Ward 5, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh city Mobile: 0983 411833 Email: tranhuutam2001@yahoo.com CAREER OBJECTIVE A mobile developer position in a mobile software development company where I can work in a professional and challenging environment to improve my skills and knowledge as well as have an opportunity to prove my ability to promote in my career and reach great achievements with the company. EDUCATION & Certification  B.Eng., Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology ( 2001 → 2006 )  Consolation Price in Viet Nam Nokia N97 Widget Challenge. ( 2009, price: 300 USD cash )  Simulator Phase Winner of Global Samsung Bada Challenge ( 2010, price: Samsung Wave 1 device)  Final Phase of Vietnam Bada Developer Challenge.( 2011, price: 65 millions VND cash)  Japanese : Japanese Language Proficiency Test Level 3. ( 2008 )  First price in Windows Phone App Running ( 2012, price: 4 Windows Phone Devices Lumia 800 devices)  TOEIC: 820 points  My apps on AppStore: https://itunes.apple.com/vn/artist/tran-huu-tam/id537631722 Page 1 WORK EXPERIENCE Project : Anomo From: 10/2012 My role : Senior developer To: NOW Technology: XMPP, Facebook SDK, Location Service, Google APIs… Company : Vinasource http://www.vinasource.com/  Link of the app on AppStore https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/anomo-meet-new- people/id529027583?mt=8  There is a paper on Asian Weekly about Anomo http://www.nwasianweekly.com/2013/11/anomo-new-mobile-app- meeting-new-people-can-bigger-facebook/  In Anomo, we are doing follow what Facebook does: Wall, Chat, Like/Unlike, Comment, Follow, Ice Breaker Game, Group Chat, Gift…  Some advanced technologies we’ve been using: Location service, XMPP, Facebook SDK, Game…some add-ons third party: New Relic, Apptentive, Flurry..  We have > 50,000 users.  I joined the project at the beginning time and have been a key developer. We have 2 or 3 resource in this project. Now I also take a role to train some newbie to help them understand the architecture of the project and lead them in some new features. Project : Koala From: 10/2013 My role : Developer and Owner To: Now Technology: Peer to Peer, third party to edit images, Facebook SDK Company : Personal application  Link of the app on AppStore https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/koala-chat-new-nearby- friends/id736620023?mt=8  I did this app for myself to sell on AppStore. Main Features: Group Chat ( Peer to Peer), Edit photo, share images.  After iOS7.0 release, I see there are some interesting new features in SDK, so I’d like to learn it from practice. That’s why I did this application as a case study.  We do support iPhone and iPad Project : Where is my parking From: 11/2013 My role : Developer and Owner To: Now Technology: MKMapKit, Google APIs, Weather APIs, Facebook SDK Company : Personal application Page 2 WORK EXPERIENCE  Link of the app on AppStore https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/where-is-my- parking/id741536940?mt=8  I did this app for myself to sell in AppStore. Main Features: Find the most convenience place for parking, Draw directions, view in 3D, screen shoot map, share to Facebook.  We do support iPhone and iPad Project : AVA dictionary From: 10/2012 My role : Developer and Owner To: 7/2012 Technology: SQLite, Sliding, JavscriptWebBridge, UnZip file APIs Company : Freelance for Mana company http://mana.vn/  Link of the app on AppStore https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/ava- tu-ien-anh-viet-viet-anh/id647566804?mt=8  Main Features: Dictionary, Setting with Font and Theme  This app is an investigation about the integration between HTML at the UI and native Object-C in background. We render UI by HTML and Javascript, we call native function by using Javascript. It is a flexible way because we can load dynamic HTML and Javascript from our Server. Project : The Gioi Tin Tuc From: 7/2012 My role : Developer and Owner To: 1/2012 Technology: WebView, HTTP Server for Caching, Sliding Menu Company : Freelance for Mana company http://mana.vn/  Link of the app on AppStore https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/the- gioi-tin-tuc/id680986712?mt=8  I did this app for myself to sell on AppStore. Main Features: Loading news from other Papers, Sliding to read news, Images, Videos from Youtube.  We cache date by using HTTP Server, at any request we save as a token with content of a file. If there is a new request, we get the file from Server and display it in the WebView in the meanwhile we do request to get the newest data then save to Server and reload the WebView if there is newest data. Project : Some PhoneGap apps From: 9/2011 My role : Developer and Owner To: 1/2012 Technology: PhoneGap, PhoneGap plugins, Facebook SDK Company : Personal applications  Link of the app on AppStore https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/english-khmer/id541420892?mt=8 https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/football- livescore/id541444125?mt=8 Page 3 WORK EXPERIENCE https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/english-idioms-for-daily- conversation/id537631719?mt=8  I did this app for myself to sell on AppStore. Main Features: Use PhoneGap to render UI, Load content of some WebSite and display into app, Use some native functions: share to Facebook, Email or SMS.  We do support iPhone and iPad. IT SKILLS / KNOWLEDGE KNOWLEDGE  6+ years experienced in software development  3+ years experienced in iOS application development.  Knowledge in mobility deployment management (deploying, patching, upgrading, etc...)  Experience and passionate in Apple iOS platform  Ability to work independently and proactively  Ability to work as part of a team, including the ability to develop new working relationships, share knowledge and work with colleagues within the team to meet service standards  Able to work under high pressure and take responsibilities, smart-worker and good attitude  Good command of English (speaking, reading and writing, presentation in English) TECHNICAL SKILLS Years of Experience Programming Language Ruby on Rails 1.5 PHP 2 Java 1 JavaScript 4 Object-C 3 HTML5 2 Development Platform & OS PhoneGap 1 iOS 3 Android 1 MAC OSX 4 Software Tool Xcode 3 Pivotal Tracker 2 Page 4 Github 2 LANGUAGE SKILLS Fluent Good Fair Vietnamese  English  Japanese  Page 5
